headline: Synchrony Financial (SYF) Announces Renewal of Financing Partnership with Polaris Inc.
summary: Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) is among the 10 Unstoppable Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Next 3 Years. Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) is one of the Unstoppable Stocks to Buy and Hold for the Next 3 Years. On February 25, the company announced that it renewed its financing partnership with Polaris Inc.
